post.body: If ur speakin of Central Refrigerated..the *reinvented* 'Dick Simon Truckin Co' just keep on looking sista ... !
when it heals in few weeks i think I'll luv it. Didja have design in mind yet?
umm i dunno know yet! its my first and its a biggy! its been a wee bit painful..like a sunburn kinda thing.
thx for that!! definitely checkin that out later today!
@ccretire thx 4 commentin! U wouldn't believe how it *feels* right now..1st Tat should have a size limit on it! lol
thank ya! ;)
ohh coolness! we're all over it! yay!
Curious.. what are jailing motorcycles? thx.
Everything has fallen into place wonderfully. Just enjoyed the best Christmas I've had in years! Already planning New Year's Eve menu! w00t!
Everyone luvs the guitar hero t-shirts we got and 8 of us are wearing 'em while visiting. ha!
Bunny is chilling at Lawrenceburg - http://bkite.com/03c7c
Referred to as the Soup-Nazi today. You hafta let taco soup simmer a spell to get the full flavor..impatient audience. But it was a hit.
Grandkids arrived a week earlier than expected...having fun doing everything and nothing at the same time.
Been up all nite playin Guitar Hero World Tour...They even have friggin Steely Dan on it! I'm in 7th Heaven. ;)
My new tattoo to disguise it...I don't do nada small! - Photo: http://bkite.com/037IM
Last summer's burn I got on my bike! Umm ya pipes do get hot! - Photo: http://bkite.com/037IH
This is my first ink. I'm nervous, skeered and sober! ;) - http://bkite.com/035F6
Bunny is chilling at Budo Tattoo Studio (100 Federal Dr # 1, Jackson, TN) - http://bkite.com/035F1
Took a while! But yes home sweet home! ahh - Photo: http://bkite.com/0346r
Bunny is chilling at 56 Wendy Ln (56 Wendy Ln, Yuma, TN 38390) - http://bkite.com/0345Q
